attributes.action: Leigh rufc to win cup because all the other teams are awful up the Leigh u15s 💛
attributes.background: leigh rufc should win the Lancashire cup because of Covid 19 and we won it last season so we should win this by default it may be dangerous to carry on with the Lancashire cup so we should win by default

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
